EmailTemplate.subject: Keep flying with 10 engines under $100,000
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Campbell]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotional-product.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Campbell]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Just a few months ago, we celebrated our first engine sale online. Since then, we have continued to expand our marketplace with parts that our customers want. From bearings to engines, we keep our customers flying.
Enjoy our special 10 Engines Under $100,000 sale. That’s right. For the next 10 days, we have 10 of our TFE engines deeply discounted through our marketplace.
Visit GoDirect Trade today and find out why The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, and Yahoo! Finance are all talking about our revolutionary aerospace marketplace.
SHOP THE 10 UNDER $100K TFE SALE <https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotional-product.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Campbell>
Honeywell Aerospace Trading Products available online at: GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Campbell]]>
